summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Virtuoso Violin Learning App. Backend APIs working with minor status code inconsistencies. Frontend fully functional with excellent UI/UX and proper data-testid attributes.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of expected 201 for successful creation
Returns 400 'Already bookmarked' for lesson-1 due to existing test data
minor_bugs.impact: Expected behavior when bookmark already exists

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of expected 201 for successful creation

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with hero section, stats (streak, minutes, lessons, pieces), and 6 explore quick links
GET /api/health returns ok status
GET /api/lessons returns 10 lessons with proper structure
GET /api/lessons/lesson-1 returns first lesson with content array and youtube_id
Lessons page displays all 10 lessons with filtering by level
Lesson detail page shows content blocks, YouTube video embed
GET /api/theory returns 6 theory topics
Theory page lists all 6 topics, theory detail shows content
GET /api/sheet-music returns 12 pieces, filtering by difficulty works
Sheet music page with search and difficulty filtering
GET /api/care-guides returns 5 guides
Care guide detail shows steps, warnings, and tips
Tuner page has 4 string buttons (G, D, A, E) with frequency display
Practice scheduler page: can add schedule entry and log session
GET /api/bookmarks returns bookmarks
Bookmarks page shows saved items with links to navigate
POST /api/progress updates completion state
GET /api/stats returns aggregate statistics
Navigation sidebar works on all pages
All pages have proper data-testid attributes
Mobile navigation (header, side menu, bottom nav) works properly

success_percentage.backend: 84% (16/19 tests passed - minor status code issues only)

action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Update backend status codes for POST endpoints to return 201 instead of 200 for created resources (practice-logs, schedule). This is a minor cosmetic improvement and doesn't affect functionality.
